meals.menu: Blueberries + plain yogurt + pinch of cinnamon + 1 boiled egg
Rice + moong dal + potol aloo curry + grilled salmon (or paneer) + cucumber salad
Roti + chicken curry (light) OR chana masala + sautéed spinach

notes: Hydrate 2–2.5 L/day
Use iodised salt; keep spices moderate
Choose pasteurised dairy; fully cook eggs/fish/meat
Prefer low-mercury fish (salmon, cod, trout, hilsa, bhetki)
Avoid raw/smoked fish, unpasteurised cheeses
Limit caffeine; herbal teas are best
Continue prenatal vitamins as prescribed
